job_description: Own developer productivity and integration tooling. Collaborate cross-functionally with engineering teams to define roadmap priorities. Drive adoption of internal developer platforms and improve developer satisfaction metrics. Experience with API design, SDK development, and developer community engagement preferred.

Lead billing platform features and drive revenue accuracy automation. Partner with finance and engineering to build scalable billing infrastructure. Own pricing strategy implementation and subscription lifecycle management. Strong background in B2B SaaS billing, usage-based pricing models preferred.

Define and execute observability product strategy for enterprise customers. Build comprehensive monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions. Work closely with SRE and platform engineering teams. Experience with distributed systems, microservices monitoring, and enterprise sales cycles required.

Drive internal tooling strategy to improve engineering productivity across 200+ person engineering org. Own build vs buy decisions, vendor evaluation, and internal platform roadmap. Partner with DevOps and Infrastructure teams to define developer experience improvements.

Lead platform infrastructure product strategy serving 50M+ users. Define API architecture, scalability roadmap, and developer platform evolution. Collaborate with engineering leadership on technical debt prioritization and platform reliability. 8+ years PM experience in high-scale systems required.
